Sentencas: It has been found that the electrical conduction behavior of La(0.9)Sr(0.1)InO(3-delta) varies with oxygen partial pressure.
Titulo: A Practice of Single Layer Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: P-type and n-type conduction at high and low oxygen partial pressure have been observed respectively.
Titulo: A Practice of Single Layer Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: While at intermediate oxygen partial pressures, the electrical conductivity changes slightly with the oxygen partial pressure.
Titulo: A Practice of Single Layer Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Thus, La(0.9)Sr(0.1)InO(3-delta) may be a possible material for making single layer solid oxide fuel cell (SLFC).
Titulo: A Practice of Single Layer Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The concept of SLFC has been tested using a piece of thick ceramic pellet of La(0.9)Sr(0.1)InO(3-delta).
Titulo: A Practice of Single Layer Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The maximum current density and power density is 12 mA/cm(2) and 3 mW/cm(2) at 800 degrees C when dilute H(2) and air were used as fuel and oxidizing agent, respectively.
Titulo: A Practice of Single Layer Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The phase stability of La(0.9)Sr(0.1)InO(3-delta) has been studied by Raman spectra and XRD.
Titulo: A Practice of Single Layer Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: It is confirmed that secondary phase may appear in La(0.9)Sr(0.1)InO(3-delta) after long term testing in low oxygen partial pressure, and finally it may be decomposed into La(2)O(3) and metal Indium.
Titulo: A Practice of Single Layer Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Much attention should be paid to stabilize La(0.9)Sr(0.1)InO(3-delta) and to improve the performance of SLFC.
Titulo: A Practice of Single Layer Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
